mapper.select: SELECT T.*, C1.SMALL_DIV BANK_CD, S1.NEIS_SCH_NM SCHOOL_NAME FROM SUA_IPSI_MST T LEFT JOIN CMN_COM_CD C1 ON C1.LARGE_DIV = 'CMN10' AND C1.CONT_DESC = T.BANK_NM LEFT JOIN SUA_HIGH_SCHL S1 ON S1.NEIS_SCH_CD = T.NEIS_SCHOOL_CD WHERE T.SUHUM_NO=#{suhumNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT F_TOI_SUA_SUHUM_CRT(#{entrnYear}, #{entrnClssCd}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, null) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SUA_IPSI_MST ( ENTRN_YEAR, ENTRN_CLSS_CD, SUHUM_NO, SUHUM_NM, SUHUM_NM_CHI, SUHUM_NM_ENG, JUMIN_NO, SEX_GB, JUPSU_NO, JUPSU_DT, JUPSU_AREA, JUNHYUNG_CD, DEPT_UNIT_CD, JUNHYUNG_DETAIL, JUYA_GB, JUNHYUNG_CD_1, DEPT_UNIT_CD_1, JUNHYUNG_DETAIL_1, JUYA_GB_1, JUNHYUNG_CD_2, DEPT_UNIT_CD_2, JUNHYUNG_DETAIL_2, JUYA_GB_2, JIWONJA_GB, NEIS_SCHOOL_CD, CS_SCHOOL_CD, JOLUP_YEAR, JOLUP_GB, MAIL_ID, COMPANY_NM, COMPANY_DAY, POST_CD, ADDRESS, TEL_NO, PHON_NO, BOHOJA_NO, ENG_ADDR, SUSI_JIWON, SUSI_SUCCESS, HSB_AGREE, UNIV_NM, HAKWE_NM, UNIV_HAKJUM, UNIV_MAX_JUMSU, UNIV_MIN_JUMSU, UNIV_AVG_JUMSU, UNIV_CON_JUMSU, CAREER_GB, DEPOSIT_MAN, BANK_NM, ACCOUNT_NO, SN_NO, SN_JUMSU, HSB_JUMSU, UNIV_JUMSU, GASAN_JUMSU, MJ_JUMSU, JUNHYUNG_JUMSU, JUNHYUNG_ORDER, TOT_ORDER, BACK_ORDER, JUDGE_DT, JUDGE_GB, JUDGE_DIS, JUDGE_CHASU, ENTRY_GB, TEL_INFO_GB, TEL_PERSON, TEL_DIS, ABAND_DT, ABAND_DIS, JUDGE_ERR, JUDGE_ERR_DIS, HAKBUN, UPD_PGM_ID, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, BIGO1, BIGO2, BIGO3, BIGO4, BIGO5, PHONE_DT, SCHOOL_GB, CREATE_DT, SN_WON_JUMSU, SN_WON_GRADE, JUDGE_DIS2, SPARE_ORDER, ABAND_CD, REPAY_CHASU, REPAY_DT, HAKJA_CD, HSB_IN_GB, JUPSU_TIME, DEPOSIT_REL, BIGO6, BIGO7, BIGO8, BIGO9, BIGO10, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_INWON, COMPANY_DISTANCE, COMPANY_TIME, COMPANY_DEPT, COMPANY_TEL, COMPANY_POST, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_FROM, COMPANY_TO, ZIP_CD1, ZIP_CD2, ADDR1, ADDR2, REFUND_GB, ONLINE_NO ) VALUES ( #{entrnYear}, #{entrnClssCd}, #{suhumNo}, #{SUHUM_NM}, #{SUHUM_NM_CHI}, #{SUHUM_NM_ENG}, #{JUMIN_NO}, CASE SUBSTR(#{JUMIN_NO}, 7, 1) WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '3' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' WHEN '4' THEN '2' END, #{suhumNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{JUPSU_AREA}, #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, #{JUNHYUNG_DETAIL}, '1', #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, #{JUNHYUNG_DETAIL_1}, '1', #{JUNHYUNG_CD_2}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD_2}, #{JUNHYUNG_DETAIL_2}, #{JUYA_GB_2}, #{JIWONJA_GB}, #{NEIS_SCHOOL_CD}, '00000000', #{JOLUP_YEAR}, #{JOLUP_GB}, #{MAIL_ID}, #{COMPANY_NM}, #{COMPANY_DAY}, #{POST_CD}, #{ADDRESS}, #{TEL_NO}, #{PHON_NO}, #{BOHOJA_NO}, #{ENG_ADDR}, #{SUSI_JIWON}, '0', '0', #{UNIV_NM}, #{HAKWE_NM}, #{UNIV_HAKJUM}, #{UNIV_MAX_JUMSU}, #{UNIV_MIN_JUMSU}, #{UNIV_AVG_JUMSU}, #{UNIV_CON_JUMSU}, #{CAREER_GB}, #{DEPOSIT_MAN}, #{BANK_NM}, #{ACCOUNT_NO}, #{SN_NO}, #{SN_JUMSU}, #{HSB_JUMSU}, #{UNIV_JUMSU}, #{GASAN_JUMSU}, #{MJ_JUMSU}, #{JUNHYUNG_JUMSU}, #{JUNHYUNG_ORDER}, #{TOT_ORDER}, #{BACK_ORDER}, #{JUDGE_DT}, #{JUDGE_GB}, #{JUDGE_DIS}, #{JUDGE_CHASU}, #{ENTRY_GB}, #{TEL_INFO_GB}, #{TEL_PERSON}, #{TEL_DIS}, #{ABAND_DT}, #{ABAND_DIS}, #{JUDGE_ERR}, #{JUDGE_ERR_DIS}, #{HAKBUN}, #{UPD_PGM_ID}, #{UPD_USER_ID}, #{UPD_DT}, #{BIGO1}, #{BIGO2}, #{BIGO3}, #{BIGO4}, #{BIGO5}, #{PHONE_DT}, #{SCHOOL_GB}, SYSDATE, #{SN_WON_JUMSU}, #{SN_WON_GRADE}, #{JUDGE_DIS2}, #{SPARE_ORDER}, #{ABAND_CD}, #{REPAY_CHASU}, #{REPAY_DT}, #{HAKJA_CD}, #{HSB_IN_GB}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #{DEPOSIT_REL}, #{BIGO6}, #{BIGO7}, #{BIGO8}, #{BIGO9}, #{BIGO10}, #{COMPANY_TYPE}, #{COMPANY_INWON}, #{COMPANY_DISTANCE}, #{COMPANY_TIME}, #{COMPANY_DEPT}, #{COMPANY_TEL}, #{COMPANY_POST}, #{COMPANY_ADDR}, #{COMPANY_FROM}, #{COMPANY_TO}, #{ZIP_CD1}, #{ZIP_CD2}, #{ADDR1}, #{ADDR2}, #{REFUND_GB}, #{ONLINE_NO} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SUA_IPSI_MST SET SUHUM_NM = #{SUHUM_NM}, JUMIN_NO = #{JUMIN_NO}, SEX_GB = CASE SUBSTR(#{JUMIN_NO}, 7, 1) WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '3' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' WHEN '4' THEN '2' END, JUPSU_AREA = #{JUPSU_AREA}, JUNHYUNG_CD = #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, DEPT_UNIT_CD = #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, JUNHYUNG_CD_1 = #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, DEPT_UNIT_CD_1 = #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, JIWONJA_GB = #{JIWONJA_GB}, NEIS_SCHOOL_CD = #{NEIS_SCHOOL_CD}, JOLUP_YEAR = #{JOLUP_YEAR}, MAIL_ID = #{MAIL_ID}, TEL_NO = #{TEL_NO}, PHON_NO = #{PHON_NO}, BOHOJA_NO = #{BOHOJA_NO}, ENG_ADDR = #{ENG_ADDR}, DEPOSIT_MAN = #{DEPOSIT_MAN}, BANK_NM = #{BANK_NM}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{ACCOUNT_NO}, DEPOSIT_REL = #{DEPOSIT_REL}, UPD_PGM_ID = #{progId}, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE, SCHOOL_GB = #{SCHOOL_GB}, ZIP_CD1 = #{ZIP_CD1}, ZIP_CD2 = #{ZIP_CD2}, ADDR1 = #{ADDR1}, ADDR2 = #{ADDR2} WHERE SUHUM_NO = #{SUHUM_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT F_TOI_SUA_DUPE_JIWON(#{entrnYear}, #{entrnClssCd}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, #{JUPSU_AREA}, #{JUMIN_NO}, #{SUHUM_NO}, '0') RTN, F_TOI_SUA_DUPE_JIWON(#{entrnYear}, #{entrnClssCd}, #{DEPT_UNIT_CD}, #{JUNHYUNG_CD}, #{JUPSU_AREA}, #{JUMIN_NO}, #{SUHUM_NO}, '1') MSG FROM DUAL

SELECT NEIS_SCH_CD, CS_SCH_CD, NEIS_SCH_NM, CS_SCH_NM, POST_CD, ADDR, TEL_NO, SIDO_CD, OLD_SCH_CD FROM SUA_HIGH_SCHL WHERE 1=1
AND NEIS_SCH_CD = #{schoolCode}
AND NEIS_SCH_NM LIKE '%' || #{schoolName} || '%'
ORDER BY NEIS_SCH_NM ASC
SELECT F_TOI_GET_JUMIN_CHECK(#{juminNo}) AS checkResult FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_TRAN( TR_NUM, TR_SENDDATE, TR_SENDSTAT, TR_MSGTYPE, TR_PHONE, TR_CALLBACK, TR_MSG, TR_ETC1, TR_ETC2, TR_ETC3, TR_ETC4, TR_ETC5) VALUES ( SC_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, '0', '0', #{hpNum}, #{backNum}, #{msg}, #{entrnYear}, #{entrnClssCd}, #{suhumNo}, '19980016', #{etc5} )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ENTRN_YEAR, ENTRN_CLSS_CD, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END_DATE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') COMP_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') COMP_END_DATE FROM ENTER_ENTRN_MASTER WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTER_ENTRN_MASTER SET ENTRN_YEAR = #{entrnYear}, ENTRN_CLSS_CD = #{entrnClssCd}, START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), END_DATE = TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), MOD_IDX = #{memIdx}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
